item.title: Pothole outside 34 Thurlestone Avenue, 24th February
item.description:
This pothole has been here for at least two weeks it is in the road near 34 Thurlestone Avenue N12 and as a small road all cars that come up or down are having to drive through it making it worse and in the long term causing damage to vehicles. If it could be fixed soon all the residents would be grateful.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 31, Thurlestone Avenue, Friern Barnet, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Outside number 5, 24th February
item.description:
The street light opposite number 5 dornfell street has been removed. It makes walking down the street very dark and next to impossible to park a car at night as there is no visibility.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 17, Dornfell Street, West Hampstead, Greater London

item.title: 20 Ospringe road communal garden/public pathway, 24th February
item.description:
A tree located in our communal garden that appears to be causing structural damage to our concrete boundary wall, which borders the public pathway. The tree’s roots seem to be affecting the stability of the wall, and it is also heavily covered in ivy that has taken over much of the tree. We are concerned that this may pose a safety hazard, particularly if the wall were to collapse onto the public footpath. Given the potential risk to both our property and public safety, we would like to request permission to have the tree removed or for the council to remove the tree.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 23, Ospringe Road, Tufnell Park, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Cambridge Avenue outside the burnt building with graffiti on the floor, 24th February
item.description:
There is a mountain of litter and rubbish that has been dumped outside the front of the burnt out building at the top of Cambridge Avenue it has not been cleaned in months and is disgusting. Please clean it up.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Cambridge Avenue, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Light missing on central bollards, 24th February
item.description:
4 or 5 of the central reservations down Poverest Road have bollard lights out and in some cases the central lamp post is. With the poor street lighting this makes it dangerous at night going down this road. One bollard has already been hit and a temporary large bollard put in place
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 170, Poverest Road, Poverest, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: I have received an email informing me that the manhole clanking has been fixed. This is incorrect. No one has been to fix it. I have a video but cannot upload it., 24th February
item.description:
The manhole has not been fixed. Please could you let me know why this has been updated as ‘Fixed’. Also when it will actually be fixed. I have taken a video this evening but I cannot attach it on here. Thank you

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Tooley Street, Bermondsey, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Recycling has not been collected in two weeks, 24th February
item.description:
Recycling bins along the north end of Cranwich Road have not been collected by the council for two weeks. Despite reporting missed bin collections and the council labelling the issue ‘remedied,’ the bins have not been collected and are now overflowing.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Cranwich Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Litter, 24th February
item.description:
There are no bins provided for half the houses on this street for general waste due to steps to properties. Most houses have bought their own bin but multiple rental properties just place the black bin bags on the street - these are ripped open by foxes and every single week the street looks like this. It is never cleaned.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 431, Abbey Road, West Heath, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
